title: Island in the Sun

tokens.lyric: This is my island in the sun

lines.raw: [D]This is my island in the sun

tokens.lyric: Where my people have toiled since time begun

lines.raw: [G]Where my people have toiled since time begun

tokens.lyric: I may sail on many a sea

lines.raw: [A7]I may sail on many a sea

tokens.lyric: Her shores will always be home to me

lines.raw: [D]Her shores will always be home to me

tokens.lyric: Oh, island in the sun

lines.raw: [D]Oh, island in the sun

tokens.lyric: Willed to me by my Father's hand

lines.raw: [G]Willed to me by my Father's hand

tokens.lyric: All my days I will sing in praise

lines.raw: [Bm]All my days I will sing in praise

tokens.lyric: Of your forest, waters, your shining sands.

lines.raw: [A7]Of your forest, waters, your shining sands.

tokens.lyric: As morning breaks

lines.raw: [D]As morning breaks

tokens.lyric: The heaven on high

lines.raw: [G]The heaven on high

tokens.lyric: I lift my heavy load to the sky

lines.raw: [A7]I lift my heavy load to the sky

tokens.lyric: Sun comes down with a burning glow

lines.raw: [D]Sun comes down with a burning glow

tokens.lyric: Mingles my sweat with the earth below

lines.raw: [G]Mingles my sweat with the earth below

tokens.lyric: I see woman on bended knee

lines.raw: [D]I see woman on bended knee

tokens.lyric: Cutting cane for her family

lines.raw: [G]Cutting cane for her family

tokens.lyric: I see man at the waterside

lines.raw: [A7]I see man at the waterside

tokens.lyric: Casting nets at the surging tide

lines.raw: [D]Casting nets at the surging tide

tokens.lyric: I hope the day will never come

lines.raw: [G]I hope the day will never come

tokens.lyric: That I can't awake to the sound of drum

lines.raw: [A7]That I can't awake to the sound of drum

tokens.lyric: Never let me miss carnival

lines.raw: [D]Never let me miss carnival

tokens.lyric: With calypso songs philosophical

lines.raw: [G]With calypso songs philosophical

source:
{title: Island in the Sun}
{key: D}

{section: Verse 1}
[D]This is my island in the sun
[G]Where my people have toiled since time begun
[A7]I may sail on many a sea
[D]Her shores will always be home to me

{section: Chorus}
[D]Oh, island in the sun
[G]Willed to me by my Father's hand
[Bm]All my days I will sing in praise
[A7]Of your forest, waters, your shining sands.

{{section: Verse 2}
[D]As morning breaks
[G]The heaven on high
[A7]I lift my heavy load to the sky
[D]Sun comes down with a burning glow
[G]Mingles my sweat with the earth below

{{section: Verse 3}
[D]I see woman on bended knee
[G]Cutting cane for her family
[A7]I see man at the waterside
[D]Casting nets at the surging tide

{{section: Verse 4}
[G]I hope the day will never come
[A7]That I can't awake to the sound of drum
[D]Never let me miss carnival
[G]With calypso songs philosophical
